Class Range<T>

Vts

Vts.dll

Immutable class that specifies a range of values and allows enumeration

[DataContract]
public abstract class Range<T> : BindableObject, INotifyPropertyChangedPlus, INotifyPropertyChanged where T : struct

The type of the values in the range

Remarks

Explicit data contract necessary for JSON.Net: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/19231367/serializing-poco-class-derived-from-baseclass-with-datacontract
